attacks.name: Perplex
attacks.text: Your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Confused.

attacks.name: Let's Snuggle & Fall
attacks.text: This attack does 30 more damage for each damage counter on your opponent's Active Pokémon.

attacks.name: Dream Fear-GX
attacks.text: Choose 1 of your opponent's Benched Pokémon. Your opponent shuffles that Pokémon and all cards attached to it into their deck. (You can't use more than 1 GX attack in a game.)
